name: Basic OMT of Richmond City E012, 2022 edition.
name_original: Basic OMT of Richmond City E012, 2022 edition.
description: This is a VERY simple satirical text-based game for windows made originally in python. It is quiet literally my first ever coding project in python, or any coding language other then some form of basic. I do plan on actively up dating this game in the rare case it gains any level of following.
